channel.title: IndexOutOfBoundsException - Error Message when I click Run-Server
channel.description:
[CODE]Feb 24, 2015 9:11:52 AM server.Server main INFO: RuneDemocracy.. is loading.. Aborted all saving to prevent lag. [ObjectDef] DONE LOADING OBJECT CONFIGURATION [Region] DONE LOADING REGION CONFIGURATIONS Feb 24, 2015 9:12:13 AM server.Server main INFO: Server listening on port runedemocracy.ddns.net:43594 Game saved for player luffy [DEREGISTERED]: luffy [REGISTERED]: naruto IP: Pass: [REGISTERED]: luffy IP: Pass: java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index: 0, Size: 0 at java.util.ArrayList.rangeCheck(Unknown Source) at java.util.ArrayList.set(Unknown Source) at server.model.customgames.CashBag.AddItem(CashBag.java:18) at server.model.items.ItemHandler.createGroundItem(ItemHandler.java:163)
at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.dropItems(NPCHandler.java:2489) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:2118) at server.Server.main(Server.java:163) Feb 24, 2015 9:12:49 AM server.Server main SEVERE: Fatal Error java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index: 0, Size: 0 at java.util.ArrayList.rangeCheck(Unknown Source) at java.util.ArrayList.set(Unknown Source) at server.model.customgames.CashBag.AddItem(CashBag.java:18) at server.model.items.ItemHandler.createGroundItem(ItemHandler.java:163)
at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.dropItems(NPCHandler.java:2489) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:2118) at server.Server.main(Server.java:163)
Saved game for naruto. Saved game for luffy. Saving players... Press any key to continue . . .[/CODE]

item.title: IndexOutOfBoundsException - Error Message when I click Run-Server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Can we see the CashBag.java file please?

Also: (I’m tired of writing the same thing like 100 times, so quoting myself)

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:550172”]Be a little more specific with what you’re having a problem with please.
If you can, please click the first link in my signature, read the topic, and then edit this post.

I understand you need help, but help me help you.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: IndexOutOfBoundsException - Error Message when I click Run-Server

item.title: IndexOutOfBoundsException - Error Message when I click Run-Server
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

You didn’t ask a question, that’d be a good start. For the sake of productivity, the error you are getting occurring because you’re trying to pass an index in an array that is larger or smaller than the actual size of the collection.

Read full topic
item.source: IndexOutOfBoundsException - Error Message when I click Run-Server

item.title: IndexOutOfBoundsException - Error Message when I click Run-Server
item.dc:creator: @StubernSnake StubernSnake
item.description:
@StubernSnake wrote:

[CODE]Feb 24, 2015 9:11:52 AM server.Server main
INFO: RuneDemocracy… is loading…
Aborted all saving to prevent lag.
[ObjectDef] DONE LOADING OBJECT CONFIGURATION
[Region] DONE LOADING REGION CONFIGURATIONS
Feb 24, 2015 9:12:13 AM server.Server main
INFO: Server listening on port runedemocracy.ddns.net:43594
Game saved for player luffy
[DEREGISTERED]: luffy
[REGISTERED]: naruto IP: Pass:
[REGISTERED]: luffy IP: Pass:
java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index: 0, Size: 0
at java.util.ArrayList.rangeCheck(Unknown Source)
at java.util.ArrayList.set(Unknown Source)
at server.model.customgames.CashBag.AddItem(CashBag.java:18)
at server.model.items.ItemHandler.createGroundItem(ItemHandler.java:163)

    at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.dropItems(NPCHandler.java:2489)
    at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:2118)
    at server.Server.main(Server.java:163)

Feb 24, 2015 9:12:49 AM server.Server main
SEVERE: Fatal Error
java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index: 0, Size: 0
at java.util.ArrayList.rangeCheck(Unknown Source)
at java.util.ArrayList.set(Unknown Source)
at server.model.customgames.CashBag.AddItem(CashBag.java:18)
at server.model.items.ItemHandler.createGroundItem(ItemHandler.java:163)

    at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.dropItems(NPCHandler.java:2489)
    at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:2118)
    at server.Server.main(Server.java:163)

Saved game for naruto.
Saved game for luffy.
Saving players…
Press any key to continue . . .[/CODE]
